sentences.cn: “ 嫩牛排配蘑菇, "杜洛埃说道, " 西红柿塞肉. ”

sentences.en: A cut of beef consisting of a double sirloin.
sentences.cn: 紧腰肉连带两侧腰肉的牛肉方.

sentences.en: A: Sirloin steak is our special of the day, sir.
sentences.cn: 腰肉上部的牛排是今天的物餐, 先生.

sentences.en: Hurstwood went out for a shave, and returned with a fair - sized sirloin steak.
sentences.cn: 赫斯渥出去修了面, 回来时带了一大块牛腰肉.

sentences.en: I order black pepper sirloin without any paprika.
sentences.cn: 我叫的是黑椒牛腰肉,不要放红椒.

sentences.en: I will have sirloin steak and salmon for the lady.
sentences.cn: 我要沙朗牛排,姐要鲑鱼.

sentences.en: I would like to have a sirloin steak and a mixed salad.
sentences.cn: 我想点牛脊肉排和什锦色拉.

sentences.en: If you like steak, have the sirloin. It's tasty as can be.
sentences.cn: 如果你想吃牛排, 来块牛腰肉. 再好吃不过了.

sentences.en: Ill have a mixed salad and a Sirloin Steak.
sentences.cn: 我要一份混合沙拉和一份沙朗牛排.

sentences.en: Sirloin steak is our special of the day, sir.
sentences.cn: 今天的特餐是里脊牛排, 先生.

sentences.en: Sirloin steak with mushrooms -- one twenty - five. "
sentences.cn: 嫩牛排配蘑菇 --1 美元2角5分.

sentences.en: That's a good idea . Give me a sirloin steak.
sentences.cn: 好的,就要一份腰部位的牛排吧.

sentences.en: The'scraps " was four or five choice slices of fresh - roasted sirloin, and smothered in hot gravy.
sentences.cn: “ 剩菜 ” 是四五片新烤的精选牛腰肉, 上面浇上了滚热的卤汁.

sentences.en: Yes , I'll have a mixed Salad and a Sirloin Steak.
sentences.cn: 我要一份综合沙拉和一客沙朗牛排.

trans.tran_en: a good-quality piece of  beef  which is cut from the lower part of a cow’s back
